title: YESWELDER True Color Solar Powered Auto Darkening Welding Helmet, Wide Shade 4/9-13 for TIG MIG ARC Weld Hood Helmet
descriptions:
Get ready to elevate your welding game with the YESWELDER True Color Solar Powered Auto Darkening Welding Helmet! This top-of-the-line helmet is perfect for TIG, MIG, and MMA welding processes, ensuring you can tackle any project with ease.

With a wide viewing size of 3.64"X1.67" and superior optical clarity rated at 1/1/1/1, you'll have a clear view of your work at all times. The helmet features 2 sensors and a rapid switch speed of 1/30000 sec, providing you with the ultimate protection and visibility.

Not only does this helmet offer compatibility with Cheater and Magnifying lenses, but it also boasts increased battery life for long-lasting use. The pivot style headgear ensures superior comfort, making it a pleasure to wear all day long.

Don't settle for less when it comes to your welding helmet. Invest in the YESWELDER True Color Solar Powered Auto Darkening Welding Helmet and experience the difference for yourself. Order yours today and take your welding to the next level!

With a wide viewing size of 3.64"X1.67" and 2 sensors, this helmet provides superior optical clarity with a shade range from 4 to 13. The quick switch speed of 1/30000 sec ensures your eyes are always protected.

Say goodbye to discomfort with the pivot style headgear that offers a snug fit for long hours of work. Compatible with Cheater Lens and Magnifying Lens, this helmet has an increased battery life for uninterrupted performance.
